note.p: American. Daughter of James Parker Milledge and Sarah Elizabeth Milledge née Job of Cambridge, Mass. Married her cousin Robert Arthur Job in 1880.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/3571/58/1); 1891 (RG12/4674/140/23)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 May 2018)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 May 2018)
Faye West, My genealogy pages, http://www.fayewest.ca/colemanjones/p3585.htm (accessed 1 May 2018)
